channel.title: About on LGM
channel.description: Recent content in About on LGM

item.title: csmertx
item.description: Christopher Roy Schammert (aka, Chris Schammert [Since 1984]) LGM (Linux Gremlin Mysteries) LGM is a pet project website with a little bin of fun mixed in with a lot of RTFM Donation button? The donation button for this website redirects to the Wounded Warrior Project This website is not an affiliated with the Wounded Warrior Project C-Smert-X, CS-Mert-X, Mertx, Smert-Tex, etc. Linux-ing for over ten years, and have been typing random things into computer prompts since 1989 (39y).
